nodes.text: Tertiary Fujar was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories. Pirates, known as the Fujari, from Tertiary Fujar were particularly active in the Tamarin and Rseik sectors about two centuries before the fall of the Old Republic until they were defeated by the Trade Defense Force.

Tertiary Fujar was originally meant to be mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart; however, the sidebar that would have mentioned the star was cut before the book's release. The information regarding Tertiary Fujar was later released in 2014 as part of Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut, a series of articles published on the StarWars.com Blog by Jason Fry and Erich Schoeneweiss containing various cut content from The Essential Guide to Warfare.
